meanings.sent1: The bidden guests arrived at the party.
meanings.sent2: The bidden book was placed on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The bidden cat finally emerged from its hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: The bidden treasure was hidden deep within the cave.
meanings.sent5: The bidden secret was finally revealed to all.

meanings.sent1: She bidden him to stop running in the hallway.
meanings.sent2: The king bidden his subjects to attend the royal banquet.
meanings.sent3: The teacher bidden the students to complete their homework by tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: The coach bidden the team to give their best effort in the game.
meanings.sent5: The officer bidden the crowd to disperse peacefully.

meanings.sent1: They bidden their friends to the birthday celebration.
meanings.sent2: She bidden him to join her for a walk in the park.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors bidden everyone to their barbecue party.
meanings.sent4: The company bidden potential clients to their product launch event.
meanings.sent5: The couple bidden their families to the wedding ceremony.
